body.name: Razer Seiren Mini USB Condenser Microphone: for Streaming and Gaming on PC - Professional Recording Quality - Precise Supercardioid Pickup Pattern - Tilting Stand - Shock Resistant - Classic Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 26 mins
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 4 hrs 11 mins
features: Ultra-Precise Supercardioid Pickup Pattern: The Razer Seiren Mini is tuned with a tighter pickup angle, so it can focus on your voice while ensuring that background noises like typing and mouse clicks don’t get picked up.
Professional Recording Quality: With its 14mm condenser capsule and flat frequency response, the mic broadcasts your voice with stellar clarity that’s filled with crisp highs and deep lows.

Ultra-Compact Build: Made for minimalist or smaller setups, it barely takes up any desk space and is discreet on-camera, putting more focus on you. Easy to bring along if you need take your streaming elsewhere.

Heavy-Duty Tilting Stand: Sitting on a sturdy support, the mic can be angled to find the perfect sweetspot for your voice. It can also be detached and mounted on a boom arm or mic stand that uses a standard 5,8-inch thread.
body.description: Big sounds can come in small packages. Meet the Razer Seiren Mini—an ultra-compact condenser mic that's the perfect fit for professional grade-audio with any streaming or video call setup.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Clarity Made Compact Razer Seiren Mini With the Razer Seiren Mini, big sounds can come in small packages. Introducing our ultra-compact condenser mic made for streaming with smaller or portable setups, and capable of producing professional-grade audio—thanks to a supercardioid pickup pattern and a 14mm condenser capsule.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact, Quality Mic for Aspiring Content Creators
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Razer Seiren Mini USB Condenser Microphone, and I must say, I'm quite impressed with its performance. As someone who's into day trading and occasionally delves into online content creation, this mic fits my needs perfectly.Pros:Compact Design: The first thing that caught my attention was its size. It's incredibly compact and doesn't take up much space on my desk, which is a big plus.Sound Quality: Despite its small size, the audio quality is surprisingly good. It captures clear and crisp audio, making it ideal for voiceovers, streaming, and video calls. I've noticed a significant improvement in the audio quality of my online meetings and content.Plug-and-Play: Setting up the Seiren Mini was a breeze. It's a true plug-and-play device, and it worked seamlessly with my computer without the need for any additional drivers or software.Affordable: Considering its quality and performance, the price point of the Razer Seiren Mini is quite reasonable. It's an excellent option for those on a budget.Cons:No Gain Control: It lacks a gain control feature, which might be a drawback for some users who want more control over their audio levels. However, I've found that adjusting the input volume in my computer settings does the job just fine.Omnidirectional Pickup: The microphone has an omnidirectional pickup pattern, which means it may capture background noise in noisy environments. It's perfect for controlled recording spaces but may require some noise reduction software in less ideal situations.In conclusion, the Razer Seiren Mini USB Condenser Microphone is a fantastic choice for anyone looking for an affordable and compact microphone for content creation, online meetings, or even gaming. It's easy to use, offers decent sound quality, and won't break the bank. While it's not without its limitations, it's a great addition to my setup, and I would recommend it to fellow content creators and gamers alike.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product for this price
reviews.reviewText: If you are looking for a good quality microphone, with good sound for an affordable price, this is what you are looking for.I must say that it has an excellent sound, quite clean, suitable for use in video calls or Discord calls, as well as online games.To be honest, I don't know if it is a suitable option for those who want to produce or record music. Perhaps this is a product more focused on people making calls on discord as I mentioned before. It doesn't need much setup before use, I literally plugged it in and started using it easily.The construction materials are correct and make it feel like a durable and visually attractive product, it is very aesthetic if you want to have an eye-catching setup together with your PC.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AMAZING "budget" Gaming / Voice Microphone for calls and work | school online meetings.
reviews.reviewText: I mainly was looking for a relatively " low budget " or cheaper microphone but wouldn't sacrifice the quality because of the price for Discord calls with friends. I didn't necessarily NEED a microphone since I have a laptop (until I get a computer) so it has a built-in one. But I just thought to myself that I deserve a better mic or an actual one mainly because I've been countless hours on call and I just thought to myself "I should get a better tech setup, and the first thing I can upgrade is my mic." ... and so I did! :-)The quality for the audio is superb!!! I'm sure when others will hear me now, it will be crystal clear, crisp, and like as if I'm in the same room. I bought acessories such as a boom arm and pop filter so that I'll have an even better experience to maneuver the mic in a more comfortable position and a filter for harsh plosives and clarity.Overall, this is a great purchase. The price point is fairly "affordable" when comparing to good quality brand microphones in general as this is in the lower price point of being less than $60!! When most are roughly around $70 ~200. So this is a steal. No regrets and I highly recommend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Sound, No Software, Great for Discord.
reviews.reviewText: Not much to say here. The title says it all.The sound is pretty good. Razer doesn't provide any software for the mic, at very least, I could not find any software.Because it does not provide any software, noise cancellation is next to nothing. You'll pick up ambient noises, fans, tapping desk, clicking keyboard, etc. So, if you have a program like discord with built in background noise cancelling, then you are set. If you use OBS, you'll just need to create your own audio profile to negate background noise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Microphone for Content Creators!
reviews.reviewText: I've been using the Razer Seiren Mini for a few weeks now, and I'm incredibly impressed with its performance. As a content creator, having clear and professional audio is essential for my videos, podcasts, and streams. The Seiren Mini delivers exactly that.The compact size is perfect for my setup, and the build quality feels solid. The plug-and-play functionality made it super easy to set up – I just plugged it in, and it was ready to use. The sound quality is outstanding, with crisp and clear audio reproduction. It significantly enhances the overall quality of my content.I also appreciate the cardioid pickup pattern, which effectively isolates my voice from background noise. This feature has been a game-changer in providing a clean and polished sound.Additionally, the Seiren Mini's sleek design adds a professional touch to my workspace. It's a visually appealing piece of tech that complements my setup wonderfully.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is a great microphone for people on a budget
reviews.reviewText: This is a great microphone for people on a budget but don't let the idea of "budget" scare you cause it really is a good microphone for starting out especially if you get the boom arm that goes with it. It's very stable when you get the boom arm with it obviously as long as you take care of the arm and the mic they are great for a good length of time for use until you get a upgrade
The media could not be loaded. Perfecto tamaño, excelente diseño y de muy alta calidad el audio que graba.

It's so simple and small, yet the sound quality is great and works just as well as any other 100$+ mic in my opinion. I got it as my first mic and have 0 complaints. Additionally, the detachable base is nice if you want to attach it to a boom arm! Super great mic if you need a budget one that looks cute too :) There's no mute button however keep in mind!
Chegou muito rapido e o som super limpo
Tolles Design. Funktioniert sehr gut. Mein Sohn benutzt es und ist sehr zufrieden

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: i used for yt vids and gaming 10/10 …. altho there is a slight faint static sometimes but… that may just be a me problem!
